name: CTFontCollectionCopyOptions
desc: Option bits for use with CTFontCollectionCopyFontAttribute(s).

items.name: static var standardSort: CTFontCollectionCopyOptions
items.desc: Passing this option indicates that the return values should be sorted in standard UI order, suitable for display to the user. This is the same sorting behavior used by NSFontPanel and Font Book.

items.name: static var unique: CTFontCollectionCopyOptions
items.desc: Passing this option indicates that duplicate values should be removed from the results.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt32)
items.desc: Creates a copy options structure with the specified raw value.
